website_summaries.verdict: Simple LED headlight bulbs that work with a variety of vehicles.
pros: Good for most common vehicle setups, particularly older cars and trucks that need a new bulb replacement
Best choice for people wanting to try out LED headlights with little experience
cons: Bulbs run hot during prolonged use

customer_reviews.title: Fails within a year.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product in march of 2018. 6 months in, both bulbs had dimmed drastically. Exactly 1 year and both bulbs have failed. Performed the troubleshooting as specified in the owners manual to diagnose the issue. It is definitely the bulbs. Attempting a warranty claim currently, will update with how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex and Bree

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is not real......
customer_reviews.text: The lights were easy to install and looked/performed great for around 9 months. Then they failed completely........ I sent the lights to the Colorado address per their instructions to utilize the 2 year warranty. I included my Amazon invoice and all required info as requested a little over two months ago and have not heard a word......literal crickets. I bought two pairs of these and one pair failed while the others are still fUnctional. My frustration is the lack of communication and a stated warranty that clearly is not worth the words they Wright.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Wiyrick

customer_reviews.title: The 2-Year Warranty is a Little Misleading
customer_reviews.text: The general performance was good. Longevity was not. 1st set of H11s lasted 23 months. Barely within the warranty. The bigger concern is they are rated at 50,000 hours. They didn't even get 500 hours. The "good" news is they sent replacements immediately. The bad news is that these replacement bulbs only lasted 8 months (less than 200 hours). The worst news is that when I inquired about these bulbs failing, I was told they fall under the original bulbs' warranty and were no longer covered. So take it for what it's worth, but I'm shopping somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Confirmed Buyer

customer_reviews.title: They don't last more than a year
customer_reviews.text: They are bright but have no longevity. The first pair gave out within the first year. Hikari sent replacements under warranty but now (under a year) one of the lights is not working.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, but time in use isn’t great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in February 2018. It’s now June 16, 2019. One headlight isn’t working now. They worked fine. No flicker, no issues. Just sucks to have to buy a new set again after a year and 4 months. I gave 4 stars, just due to lack of time I used them and one went out. I’ll probably try a different brand. But these did work well, super easy install on my 2017 tacoma.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Ayles

customer_reviews.title: one of the bulbs died in 5 months
customer_reviews.text: one of the bulbs died quickly due to corrosion by the connection of the balast and the other also started to go bad so i had to get a different brand which has a better cable design and light pattern
customer_reviews.author: BooRocK

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought these lights just about a year ago. Easy to install (plug and play) and had a nice bright light but just recently noticed the light on the passenger's side was much less bright than the other. I pulled the LED out and found one of the chips was out. I flicked it a couple times and got it working again. A day later I found i had a completely dead headlight. I will be calling CS to inquire about the warranty but as mentioned in other reviews their team is not the most responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets one for headlights and 1 for fog lights. Very bright and loved them at first. 2 months later one burned out. 2nd one burned out the following month. 3rd one turned purple for 2 weeks then burned out. Did not wait for 4th one to burn out. Trashed them all. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Blinding
customer_reviews.text: Very brute, in a reflector housing you will have light going everywhere and people complain your brutes are on. Bulbs lasted 2 years and I would have taken them out earlier but the pain is they don’t fit on passenger side bulb without loosening the housing... and bumper to install.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: YOU WILL HAVE TO KEEP REPLACING
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the lights, was pleased with how bright it made things and added visibility. What I did not like was the fact that every few months I was having to reach out to request a new bulb under my warranty, I am now on my third warranty. I will not be recommended them due to the fact that the longevity is weak. Decent customer service and responded quickly.
customer_reviews.author: cjhill32

customer_reviews.title: worked great but lasted less than any regular bulb i ever had
customer_reviews.text: worked great for about 1 1/2 years then the left light slowly went dim over a 2 day period. 1 week later the right light went dim also over a 2 day period. replaced with my old incandescent bulbs and all was bright again so the problem was neither the wiring or the car. never had any incandescent headlight bulbs last so little time.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Failed just after Warranty Expires
customer_reviews.text: One of them failed and started to hum 5x as loud as the other (just after 2 year warranty expired). The other one is now doing the same. I'll leave it at 2 stars for lack of longevity, but they did work for a couple of years .
customer_reviews.author: Jedi M.

customer_reviews.title: Good headlight but doesn't seem to last long
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my mother's 11 Camry since one of her headlights got burnt out. when it arrived and after installing it, it was easy plug and play and the brightness has met my expectations and sure did helped us drive safer at night. however, only 1 year and 3 months i see the led lights were really dimmed and there wasn't much i could do. i would give a 5 star but having this minor issue which can lead to safety problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The newer HIKARI bulbs called "Thunder" are awesome
customer_reviews.text: HIKARI bulbs called "Thunder" are the perfect balance of durability, quality and price!! Worth every penny!!! The thunder bulbs are awesome, mine burn all the time when the Silverado is running 6 months and not a problem
customer_reviews.author: bird

customer_reviews.title: Utilize that customer service and warranty. You're going to need it
customer_reviews.text: Been one year. Bulbs burned out. Time to contact customer service... Update: second set of bulbs burned out within two years. Customer service time again.... This time they sent me the cheaper version as a replacement....
customer_reviews.author: tamafighting

customer_reviews.title: Range Rover Sport
customer_reviews.text: Insanely bright! Yes, they’re expensive, but LAST LONG! So many options out there and ive tried soo many! Hikari have no competition! Theyre sooo bright! You wont regret it! Promise!
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Failed twice in 1.7 years
customer_reviews.text: I have a Ford Fusion Energi which requires you to remove the entire front bumper to access the headlight bulbs. I replaced an LED about 10 months ago and now again. Unreliable though brightness was good.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: One of my bulbs burned out just over a year into use. Unlike other reviews I've seen concerning service, I sent them an email, they replied quickly asking for a photo of the dead bulb, which I provided. They quickly sent a replacement set and the new ones are installed. Excellent service from my POV.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Corrado

customer_reviews.title: Hikari disappointed customer!
customer_reviews.text: Received box. It was obviously taped but open when I got it. Light are in horrible condition. Missing pieces and led diodes was damaged. This is truly a JOKE! I’ve ordered (2) sets with ease and I’m highly disappointed with this order!
customer_reviews.author: Jose a Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Disgraceful junk!
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk! See video of guy below, same thing happened to mine. No light and the cooling fan screaming, except my led actually melted itself off.
customer_reviews.author: Rzr guy

customer_reviews.title: Good.....but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for about 2 years now and they still work fine. Good lighting but not really better than stock halogen to be honest. They really underperformed and I was really disappointed. But i have to say they have really paid off for how long they have lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Martin C.

customer_reviews.title: Last for 2 years and then they die...
customer_reviews.text: Great Lights. Had them installed for 2 years Looks good in my 2017 Accord SE. Updated 1/9/20 Well one of the LEDs stopped working today and its no longer covered under warranty. Go figure smh..
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a little over a year ago and they were great when we first installed them. Super bright. But they don’t last long. One has already gone out and the other is very dim now. Not worth the money. Sent them in for the two year warranty but..... nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Momma

customer_reviews.title: amazon and Hikari both point the finger
customer_reviews.text: Mine are still under warranty. Cannot get a response from hikari and the website says to contact your authorized dealer for warranty concerns. Amazon says they do not do warranty and gave me an email address because there is no phone number for Hikari. The email address they gave me was the wrong company. I am tired of trying to get a hold of someone to replace these lights that no longer work after 12 months
customer_reviews.author: Jason Dahlin

customer_reviews.title: Too dim to use safely
customer_reviews.text: Can't keep them installed. Just not bright enough beam and way too short to drive safely at night. But they work.
customer_reviews.author: glandpuck

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with these
customer_reviews.text: As with others,I've had both my bulbs go dead,1 within a year,2nd one half a year after the warranty. This may be the reason why they're no longer selling?
customer_reviews.author: peter cheng

customer_reviews.title: 2 years and some change
customer_reviews.text: They lasted a little over two years with moderate use, but then both recently died. For the price, I would have liked to get more liife out of them. Brightness was decent though
customer_reviews.author: Eye Bee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty light and bright !
customer_reviews.text: Great light bulb, looks bright and clean. Just one thing they burn out after a while. Warranty is really Good but you have to wait a while to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos P.

customer_reviews.title: Longevity slacks and no way to warranty it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased both high and low beams.. low beam, I had one bulb partially fail 8 months into use. Attempted to get in touch about the warranty. Never have been contacted back. Now the bulb has completely failed and still no contact. Looking for better brands. I will be slightly possitive, the brightness of my set were nice but longevity was not.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W Casto

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Great lights. Bright, price, easy installation. Excellent for any weather condition. Buy them, you will not regret acquiring them
customer_reviews.author: C. M. G.

customer_reviews.title: Very bright but do not last. Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: About 2years out and now needing 3rd pair. Very bright but do not last. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DruD

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: 10/19 one stopped working I’m checking to see if they are still under warranty but I believe is only 2 years. I got my pair back in 12/16
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent white look and easy install. Just swap your bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: Great look, extremely bright and so far has lasted for a year with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: G MAN

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 16 months in Alaska
customer_reviews.text: Dead - bought jan 2018 —- Now its may 2019 — failed. That is 16 months. But you dont use bulbs or headlights at all in summer time in alaska.
customer_reviews.author: UltimateCombatMerc

customer_reviews.title: Bulb life is TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Beware buyers - this product is defective. My bulbs lasted about 1 year and the LED portion of the bulb burned out and fell off. They have since discontinued this model and are selling the exact same bulb with a different part number through amazon to avoid the bad reviews. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: william j ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Great look do not last
customer_reviews.text: They were great for 8 months, now one has stopped working..... so not with spending the money
customer_reviews.author: Jahre Zugbi

customer_reviews.title: Quit within 2 years and no customer support for warranty
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of these headlights and they both quit working within 2 years. You will not get a response form Hikari either.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: Low light output poor life
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs lasted about a year and just like everyone else. Flickered then died.
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: they are nice and all but they dont last long.
customer_reviews.text: this light is barely used like at all its on my 2016 r6 that only has 5k miles and these lights were installed with the bike having 2k miles. these light do not last long do not waist your money. i bought these believing that expensive would be better quality but it seems that i waisted my money. i do not recommend these lights at all.
customer_reviews.author: juan j.

customer_reviews.title: Don't last
customer_reviews.text: One of the bulbs went out, i tried getting a replacement from the manufacturer but with not luck, the warranty they offered is only to get people to buy their LED.
customer_reviews.author: el n.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: After 8 months the bulbs have lost brightness, one is almost blue and the other one is almost yellow. For a 70 USD price that’s unacceptable. I don’t know how to reach them for the 2 years warranty either.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality and waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have replaced two headlights less than 2 years. Very bad quality and totally waste of money. It is not easy to get into the hood and replace the headlights for my car. Wasting my time and raise safety concerns. Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaiqing

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping. Skip this product.
customer_reviews.text: A year after purchase review: I never really thought they were bright as bright as they should be but I figured that’s how they were supposed to be but after one year, 1 of bulbs went out. Don’t buy this product if you care for long lasting life of the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Grajeda

customer_reviews.title: Really bright
customer_reviews.text: These are very bright lights. Brighter than most high beams
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN BARKER

customer_reviews.title: They Don't Last Long:
customer_reviews.text: At first they were bright and the light seemed evenly distributed. But, I have had these for just over a year now and they have progressively declined in brightness. On top of that the beam is spotted, with some areas being brighter than other areas. I would avoid these and look for a better quality LED bulb.
customer_reviews.author: J-Dog

customer_reviews.title: Light failure.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bulbs in October 2017. They started flickering within the last month. Took them out tonight and it’s obvious the chipsets are coming loose. A light tap will make them come back on and then off again. Brightness has also significantly degraded over the last year.
customer_reviews.author: cody hofmann

customer_reviews.title: Very bright. Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Headlights are nice and bright, easy install. Just had a bulb go out 23 months after purchase. Also light is not focused wide like stock as much as narrow and far out
customer_reviews.author: CoryBobby

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bulbs a couple years ago and I have replaced 4 bulbs already. the only reason i used 4 bulbs and didnt get a new product is because they did honor their 2 year warranty. But either way, it is a very poorly made bulb. it is bright while it works but doesnt work for long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died right after a year old.
customer_reviews.text: The LED lights worked great and were easy to install, but a little after a year the fan got loud and the bulb no longer works. I plugged in the standard halogen bulb and it turned right on. I'll update this post once I go through the warranty process.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned in other reviews, bulb failed after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1 year
customer_reviews.text: One bulb is now flickering and needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended It.
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended. the fan is so loud. It burned after two years and few months.
customer_reviews.author: Kn2005

customer_reviews.title: Failed with less than one year use.
customer_reviews.text: worked pretty well for awhile. Then would periodically flicker. Now, one of my low beam h11 bulbs has failed and is a dim, barely lit blue hue. Product apparently has a two year warranty that I will now need to make a claim for.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Burkart

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace these lights twice, same problem, Led chip is "cold soldered" and eventually just coming off. Replaced it once with warranty, replacement worked for less then a year, same issue happened again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sutrop

customer_reviews.title: Bright but does not last
customer_reviews.text: These products are great but they do not last , I don’t even know how to contact them to get a replacement . I purchased these around 10-12 months ago .
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good headlights, but dont last long.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on 2016 Chevy Equinox. Purchased July 2017, my passenger side bulb just burned out. These bulbs will only last a little over 2 years. They put off great light, but the durability is poor. Only highway driving.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Beware Buyers remorse
customer_reviews.text: Less than 6 months passenger side lights went out professionally installed had to pay again for trouble shooting and purchase of new lights. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY LIKE I DID!!!
customer_reviews.author: TJay

customer_reviews.title: Dont last long
customer_reviews.text: Went out in less then 2 years i thought leds should last alot longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started flickering after two years
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install I'll give it that. After a few months, the light temperature started switching from white to like yellow white. Two years in, it starts flickering and I need to buy a new headlight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LED
customer_reviews.text: Product began to dim after 6 months, now one year almost to the day of purchase one of the lights died completely. 2 year warranty though so, I will attempt to contact seller. Will update after.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Warranty. Lights out
customer_reviews.text: Both of my lights have now gone out. Less than a year of having them. Since there's a warranty on them, I'm not disappointed. I loved them when they worked and super easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Terhune

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and seller👌👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Seller is amazing and they are really good when it comes to warranty with no issue at all, totally recommended to everyone
customer_reviews.author: joel

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: lasted two years, not worth the money for two years.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last as long as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in 2017. One died today. Expected these to last longer, will try different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Worst LED headlights
customer_reviews.text: I had them for less than a year and they broke already. They are not the best LED headlights as per description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, wish it lasted longer. At least the two years the guarantee...
customer_reviews.text: One bulb went out after about 18months, I am unable to figure out how to submit a warranty claim. I guess they do not care since the product is no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S.

customer_reviews.title: Great led lights
customer_reviews.text: Have had these led lights for more then a year and still working great
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Perez

customer_reviews.title: They burn out in 13 months and the warrantee is not real - they lie
customer_reviews.text: Good product until it prematurely burns out snd they lie to you about their warrantee.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have had multiple brands so far, these blow everyone else out of the water.. clear.. clean.. crisp view.. if you want awesome clean bright headlights... these are the ones.. highly recommend.. have them on two vehicles.. truck and car.
customer_reviews.author: Kedron Ketcham

customer_reviews.title: Short life span.
customer_reviews.text: Bought in May 2017 it is now December 2019 and one headlight and fog light are both out. This is a second car and has very little hours with the lights on. It is a conservative guess of 500 hours of night or dark environment use. They we easy to install and very bright but I expected them to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blinding oncoming traffic
customer_reviews.text: these are expensive for what you get. They are a plug and play, it is quite a lot to make it all fit under a dust cap though. I took them out after 1 week use because they distort the light output SOOO MUCH, hot spot was unfocused and these blind on coming traffic. Stay away from these. I paid a couple dollars more and bought Morimoto 2 stroke LED bulbs. WOW, now those! those are amazing bulbs and OEM beam pattern but much better to see at night now. Best part is, the morimoto's dont blind or cause a glare to on coming traffic!
customer_reviews.author: Sgtfluffy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bright lights I'll never use halogen or HID again. Only drawback is these LED Lights only last about a year give or take.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed them to do
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, high light output with a great throw and I do not get flashed when driving down the road. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: r2

product_meta.title: HIKARI LED Headlight Bulbs Conversion Kit -H11(H8,H9),CREE XHP50
feature_bullets: ▲Top CREE XHP50 leds,2546lm/per led.[More reference from Cree official website]
▲Suitable for: H11/H8/H9. Used for Headlight , Fog Light, DRL
▲TWO YEARS warranty offered on damaged items and defective items(conditions apply)
▲Perfect and fast after-sales service.Get a new replacement within 2 days(Only Hikari can do this).You can see the replacement for warranty on our shop homepage.
▲Amazon filter system may not be 100% accurate or up to date.If you are not sure which bulb size that your vehicle requires,please google "Philips automotive bulb look-up."

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars220 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
